entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 06:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
